title: How Did I Fall In Love With You
lyrics: Intro: :   ..Remember when we never needed each other, The best of friends like, sister and brother We understood we'd never be alone....... . ..Those days are gone and I want you so much, The night is long and I need your touch Don't know what to say, I never meant to feel this way, Don't want to be alone tonight What can I do to make you mine Fallen so hard, so fast this time What did I say, what did you do? How did I fall in love with you? ..I hear your voice and I start to tremble Bring back the child that, I resemble I cannot pretend, that we can still be friend Don't want to be alone tonight What can I do to make you mine Fallen so hard, so fast this time What did I say, what did you do? How did I fall in love with you … Oh I want to say this right, and it has to be tonight Just need you to know ohhh... I don't want to live this life, I don't want to say goodbye With you I wanna spend the rest of my life... … What can I do to make you mine Fallen so hard, so fast this time What did I say, what did you do? How did I fall in love with you What can I do to make you mine Fallen so hard, so fast this time Everything changed we never knew . How did I fall in love with you.
